unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes: Diwali Dhamaka for Aspiring Homeowners!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes: Diwali Dhamaka for Aspiring Homeowners!**

unnormalised: Diwali's just around the corner, and banks are showering us with sweet deals on home loans! Think of it as a financial Mithai platter, but instead of sweets, you get lower interest rates!
normalised: Diwali's just around the corner, and banks are showering us with sweet deals on home loans! Think of it as a financial Mithai platter, but instead of sweets, you get lower interest rates!

unnormalised: HDFC and ICICI Bank are leading the charge, slashing rates by up to 0.25% for eligible applicants. Meaning lower EMIs, more money for decorating your new house with festive lights!
normalised: H D F C and I C I C I Bank are leading the charge, slashing rates by up to zero point two five percent for eligible applicants. Meaning lower E M I s, more money for decorating your new house with festive lights!

unnormalised: SBI is also playing the game, offering special processing fee waivers. Imagine saving a chunk of change – perfect for buying that extra serving of biryani this Diwali!
normalised: S B I is also playing the game, offering special processing fee waivers. Imagine saving a chunk of change – perfect for buying that extra serving of biryani this Diwali!

unnormalised: Experts suggest comparing rates across different lenders. Don’t just jump at the first offer; do your homework, like your momma always tells you!
normalised: Experts suggest comparing rates across different lenders. Don’t just jump at the first offer; do your homework, like your momma always tells you!

unnormalised: Plus, many lenders are offering pre-approved loans. Quick approval means you can snag that perfect 2 BHK in Bandra faster than you can say "Happy Diwali!".
normalised: Plus, many lenders are offering pre-approved loans. Quick approval means you can snag that perfect two B H K in Bandra faster than you can say "Happy Diwali!".

unnormalised: Some schemes even allow you to borrow upto Rs. 5 Crores, depending on your eligibility. Time to chase that dream of owning a swanky apartment with a view!
normalised: Some schemes even allow you to borrow up to rupee five crores, depending on your eligibility. Time to chase that dream of owning a swanky apartment with a view!

unnormalised: However, read the fine print carefully, folks. Prepayment penalties and other charges may apply.
normalised: However, read the fine print carefully, folks. Prepayment penalties and other charges may apply.

unnormalised: So, this Diwali, take the plunge and invest in your dream home. Shubh Diwali!
normalised: So, this Diwali, take the plunge and invest in your dream home. Shubh Diwali!
